title: Life Before Damaged, Volume 3: The Ferro Family
description: Money. Power. Sex. If I can just hold on a little longer, if I can just survive my secret, maybe I can salvage my future, too. I don't deserve a second chance, but if I've got one, there's no way I'm wasting it on a player like Pete Ferro. Genre: New Adult Romance This story unfolds over multiple volumes
author: H.M. Ward
